Name: The New South Wales College of Nursing

About.Hours & facilities: Open Thursdays or by appointment. Reference assistance available in person. Copying available. Library and Historical Book collection available to researchers.

About.Acquisition focus: Professional issues in nursing. Documentation relating to the education of nurses in NSW.

About.Major holdings: NSW College of Nursing 1949-. NSW College of Nursing Photographic Collection 1949-. Florence Nightingale committee of Australia, NSW Branch 1949-1991. Royal College Nursing Australia, State Committee and later NSW Chapter 1949-1975. Muriel Knox Doherty collection papers and photographs. Personal papers and collections from significant nurses who have had a relationship with the College. Marrickville Hospital - Nursing records, Hospital Annual Reports, Histories and photographic collection. PAIS special interest group 1990-1994. Sydney Metropolitan Teaching Hospitals Consortium 1989-2001.
